ygData.subject: Re: Jewelry - what are you wearing?
ygData.msgSnippet: I picked up a pair of gold star ruby rings from a DE who I roleplayed with for a bit (we got into an argument over pulls in Unrest) around level 19. I didn t
ygData.messageBody:
I picked up a pair of gold star ruby rings from a DE who I roleplayed with
for a bit (we got into an argument over pulls in Unrest) around level 19.
I didn't know much about what was available at the time, and now consider
myself extremely lucky.

For earrings, I have one Opalline (5cha) and one gold amber (3str).
Looking through available options, I likely will find myself another
Opalline to get rid of the now-useless extra strength (good when I was in
my bronze phase).

I'm currently wearing my Guise of the Deceiver, as it offers 13cha and
7magic resistance. The 9/9 is tempting, but it'd cause a hassle whenever
night fell.

Lately, missed notes have been aggrivating me to no end. My current wish
is to pick up a cloak of shadows, but I don't see that happening anytime
soon.

For necklace, I've got the 5dex one at the moment (cat's eye gold, I
believe). My friend hasn't gotten to the point where she's able to make
me a BP choker without blinking at the cost (I helped fund her through the
early skill development, considering it a worthwhile investment ;).

Athren Notechaser, stuck at 36 through Sunday, CT
